snippet: “Fifty Shades of Grey,’' a best seller that deals with a sadomasochistic relationship, topped the list of books that readers complained about in 2012.
abstract: American Library Association releases its annual list of books that readers complained about the most in 2012.
lead_paragraph: “Fifty Shades of Grey,’' a best seller that deals with a sadomasochistic relationship, topped the list of books that readers complained about in 2012.

headline.seo: Library Group Lists Frequently Challenged Books
headline.main: Library Association Lists Frequently Challenged Books
headline.print_headline: Whips and Underpants: Complaints Over Books
